data.comment: Cardiff kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Curtis Nelson (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 5, Sean Morrison puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Goal! Cardiff extend their lead to 2-0 through Mark Harris.
Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a first substitution, with James Bree replacing Ruddock Pelly.
In the minute 42, Sam Nombe is on a sub for Luke Berry for Luton.
Luton have kicked-off the second half at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 59, Cardiff take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Kieffer Moore.
Nathan Jones is making the team's third substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Elliott Lee replacing Harry Cornick.
The home team replace Joe Ralls with Marlon Pack.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Kieffer Moore with Robert Glatzel. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Harris.
Joe Morrell is replacing Ryan Tunnicliffe for Luton at Cardiff City Stadium.
Luton make their fifth substitution with Tom Lockyer replacing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Harry Wilson with Junior Hoilett.
Cardiff make their fourth substitution with Gavin Whyte replacing Mark Harris.
Goal! Cardiff extend their lead to 4-0 thanks to a Sheyi Ojo header.
In the minute 86, Josh Murphy is replacing Sheyi Ojo for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-0.
